description: This file defines a DatabaseService class that provides a minimal wrapper over the sqflite package to handle database initialization and schema creation for storing orders in a Flutter/Dart project.

classes.name: DatabaseService
classes.description: Provides methods to open and initialize the SQLite database, specifically for storing orders, with a stub for future enhancements.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Initializes the database, creating the orders table if it does not already exist, and returns the database instance.
